22 MainWindow::MainWindow(int argc, char** argv, QWidget *parent)
23  : QMainWindow(parent)
24  , qnode(argc,argv)
25 {
26  qRegisterMetaType<boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> >("boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer>");
27  qRegisterMetaType<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> ("pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr");
28  qRegisterMetaType<std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> >("std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr>");
29  // Initialize UI
30  ui.setupUi(this);
31  QObject::connect(ui.actionAbout_Qt, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)), qApp, SLOT(aboutQt()));
32  setWindowIcon(QIcon(":/images/icon.png"));
33  QObject::connect(&qnode, SIGNAL(rosShutdown()), this, SLOT(close()));
34 
35  // Initialize ROS
36  qnode.init();
37 
38  // Manipulator / Filter
39  manipulator = new PointCloudManipulator();
40  QObject::connect(&qnode, SIGNAL(send3Clouds(std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr>)), this, SLOT(receive3Clouds(std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr>)));
41  QObject::connect(manipulator, SIGNAL(sendNewIndexInfo(QStringList,QList<bool>, QList<double>)), this, SLOT(setNewIndexInfo(QStringList,QList<bool>, QList<double>)));
42  QObject::connect(manipulator, SIGNAL(sendNewVisualizer(boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer>)), this, SLOT(setNewVis(boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer>)));
43  QObject::connect(manipulator, SIGNAL(sendNewPointCloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr, QString)), this, SLOT(displayPointCloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr, QString)));

45  // Initialize UI
46  initializeUI();

57 void MainWindow::displayPointCloud(QString url, QString name)
58 {
59  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
60  if(pcl::io::loadPCDFile<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(url.toUtf8().constData(), *tmpCloud) == -1){
61  std::cout << "Could not load file" << std::endl;
62  return;
63  }
64  displayCloud = tmpCloud;
65  if(!viewer1->updatePointCloud(displayCloud, name.toUtf8().constData())){
66  viewer1->addPointCloud(displayCloud, name.toUtf8().constData());
67  }
68  w1->update();
69 }
70 
71 void MainWindow::displayPointCloudLeft(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud, QString name)
72 {
73  displayCloud = cloud;
74  if(!viewer1->updatePointCloud(displayCloud, name.toUtf8().constData())){
75  viewer1->addPointCloud(displayCloud, name.toUtf8().constData());
76  }
77  w1->update();
78 }
79 
80 void MainWindow::displayPointCloud(pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr cloud, QString name)
81 {
82  filteredCloud = cloud;
83  if(!viewer2->updatePointCloud(filteredCloud, name.toUtf8().constData())){
84  viewer2->addPointCloud(filteredCloud, name.toUtf8().constData());
85  }
86  w2->update();
87 }

89 void MainWindow::receive3Clouds(std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr> clouds)
90 {
91  // ADD SELECTED MODEL TO THE CLOUDS VECTOR BEFORE SENDING
92  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr model (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>());
93  std::string path = ros::package::getPath("qt_master");
94  path.append("/models/");
95  QString tmp = ui.modelList->currentText();
96  path.append(tmp.toStdString());
97  path.append(".pcd");
98  pcl::io::loadPCDFile<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(path, *model);
99  clouds.push_back(model);
100 
101  std::cout << "Size of clouds: " << clouds.size() << std::endl;
102 
103  manipulator->alignAndMatch(clouds);
104 }

126 void MainWindow::on_button_save_filtered_cloud_clicked(bool check)
127 {
128  QString selFilter="PCD files (*.pcd)";
129  QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,"Save file",QDir::currentPath(),
130  "PCD files (*.pcd)",&selFilter);
131  if(!fileName.endsWith(".pcd",Qt::CaseInsensitive)){
132  fileName.append(".pcd");
133  }
134  pcl::io::savePCDFileBinary(fileName.toUtf8().constData(), *filteredCloud);
135 }

138 void MainWindow::on_button_filter_clicked(bool check)
139 {
140  if(changedFilter == true){
141  manipulator->getNewVisualizer(ui.filter_box->currentIndex());
142  changedFilter = false;
143  }
144  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
145  manipulator->runFilter(ui.filter_box->currentIndex(), displayCloud, tmpCloud, ui.spinBox_1->value(), ui.spinBox_2->value(), ui.spinBox_3->value(), ui.filter_XYZ->currentText());
146 }

148 void MainWindow::on_button_add_cloud_clicked(bool check)
149 {
150  QStringList fileNames;
151  fileNames = QFileDialog::getOpenFileNames(this,tr("Choose a .pcd file(s) to open"),"/home/",tr("PointClouds (*.pcd *.PCD)"));
152  if(ui.check_RGB->isChecked()){
153  std::vector<float> zValues(217088);
154  for (int i = 0; i<fileNames.size(); i++){
155  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
156  pcl::io::loadPCDFile<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(fileNames.at(i).toUtf8().constData(), *tmpCloud);
157  std::cout << tmpCloud->points.size() << std::endl;
158  for(int k=0; k<tmpCloud->points.size(); k++){
159  zValues[k] += tmpCloud->points[k].z*(1.0/fileNames.size());
160  }
161  if(i == fileNames.size()-1){
162  for(int k=0; k<tmpCloud->points.size(); k++){
163  tmpCloud->points[k].z = zValues[k];
164  displayCloud = tmpCloud;
165  }
166  }
167  }
168  displayPointCloudLeft(displayCloud, "displayCloud");
169  }
170  else{
171  for (int i = 0; i<fileNames.size(); i++){
172  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tmpCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
173  pcl::io::loadPCDFile<pcl::PointXYZRGB>(fileNames.at(i).toUtf8().constData(), *tmpCloud);
174  if(i == 0){
175  displayCloud = tmpCloud;
176  }
177  else{
178  std::cout << i << std::endl;
179  std::cout << tmpCloud->size() << std::endl;
180  *displayCloud += *tmpCloud;
181  }
182  }
183  displayPointCloudLeft(displayCloud, "displayCloud");
184  }
185

187 }

207 void MainWindow::on_button_match_clicked(bool check)
208 {
209  QString modelName;
210  modelName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this,tr("Choose MODEL cloud"),"/home/",tr("PCD File (*.pcd *.PCD)"));
211  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr modelCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
212  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(modelName.toStdString(), *modelCloud);
213  QString sceneName;
214  sceneName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this,tr("Choose SCENE cloud"),"/home/",tr("PCD File (*.pcd *.PCD)"));
215  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr sceneCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
216  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(sceneName.toStdString(), *sceneCloud);
217 
218  manipulator->matchModelCloud(modelCloud, sceneCloud);
219 
220 }

274 void MainWindow::on_button_plan_move_clicked(bool check)
275 {
276  if(ui.robot_selector->currentIndex() == 0){
277  // Agilus1
278  std::cout << "SUPPOSED TO PLAN AG1" << std::endl;
279  qnode.planPose(ui.x_pos->value(), ui.y_pos->value(), ui.z_pos->value(), ui.roll->value(), ui.pitch->value(), ui.yaw->value(),0);
280  }
281  else if(ui.robot_selector->currentIndex() == 1){
282  // Agilus2
283  std::cout << "SUPPOSED TO PLAN AG2" << std::endl;
284  qnode.planPose(ui.x_pos->value(), ui.y_pos->value(), ui.z_pos->value(), ui.roll->value(), ui.pitch->value(), ui.yaw->value(),1);
285  }
286 
287 }

302 void MainWindow::on_slider_1_valueChanged(int i)
303 {
304  double d = i/100.0;
305  if(ui.spinBox_1->minimum() < 0.0){
306  ui.spinBox_1->setValue(ui.spinBox_1->minimum()+(d*(abs(ui.spinBox_1->maximum())+abs(ui.spinBox_1->minimum()))));
307  }
308  else{
309  ui.spinBox_1->setValue(ui.spinBox_1->minimum()+(d*(ui.spinBox_1->maximum()-ui.spinBox_1->minimum())));
310  }
311  if(ui.auto_check->isChecked()){
312  Q_EMIT on_button_filter_clicked(true);
313 
314  }
315 
316 }
317 
318 void MainWindow::on_slider_2_valueChanged(int i)
319 {
320  double d = i/100.0;
321  if(ui.spinBox_2->minimum() < 0.0){
322  ui.spinBox_2->setValue(ui.spinBox_2->minimum()+(d*(abs(ui.spinBox_2->maximum())+abs(ui.spinBox_2->minimum()))));
323  }
324  else{
325  ui.spinBox_2->setValue(ui.spinBox_2->minimum()+(d*(ui.spinBox_2->maximum()-ui.spinBox_2->minimum())));
326  }
327  if(ui.auto_check->isChecked()){
328  Q_EMIT on_button_filter_clicked(true);
329  }
330 
331 }

378 void MainWindow::setNewIndexInfo(QStringList labels, QList<bool> show, QList<double> stepsAndRange)
379 {
380  ui.label_f_1->setText(labels.at(0));
381  ui.label_f_2->setText(labels.at(1));
382  ui.label_f_3->setText(labels.at(2));
383  ui.label_f_1->setVisible(show.at(0));
384  ui.label_f_2->setVisible(show.at(1));
385  ui.label_f_3->setVisible(show.at(2));
386  ui.spinBox_1->setVisible(show.at(0));
387  ui.spinBox_2->setVisible(show.at(1));
388  ui.spinBox_3->setVisible(show.at(2));
389  ui.spinBox_1->setSingleStep(stepsAndRange.at(0));
390  ui.spinBox_2->setSingleStep(stepsAndRange.at(1));
391  ui.spinBox_3->setSingleStep(stepsAndRange.at(2));
392  ui.spinBox_1->setMinimum(stepsAndRange.at(3));
393  ui.spinBox_1->setMaximum(stepsAndRange.at(4));
394  ui.spinBox_2->setMinimum(stepsAndRange.at(5));
395  ui.spinBox_2->setMaximum(stepsAndRange.at(6));
396  ui.spinBox_3->setMinimum(stepsAndRange.at(7));
397  ui.spinBox_3->setMaximum(stepsAndRange.at(8));
398  ui.slider_1->setVisible(show.at(0));
399  ui.slider_2->setVisible(show.at(1));
400  ui.slider_3->setVisible(show.at(2));
401  ui.filter_XYZ->setVisible(show.at(3));
402 
403  Q_EMIT on_slider_1_valueChanged(50);
404  Q_EMIT on_slider_2_valueChanged(50);
405  Q_EMIT on_slider_3_valueChanged(50);
406 }

408 void MainWindow::setNewVis(boost::shared_ptr<pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer> vis)
409 {
410  viewer2->getCameras(cam);
411  viewer2 = vis;
412  w2->SetRenderWindow(viewer2->getRenderWindow());
413  viewer2->setCameraPosition(cam[0].pos[0],cam[0].pos[1],cam[0].pos[2],cam[0].view[0],cam[0].view[1],cam[0].view[2]);
414 }
415 
416 void MainWindow::initializeUI()
417 {
418  // Viewer setup
419  w1 = new QVTKWidget();
420  w2 = new QVTKWidget();
421  viewer1.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("viewer1", false));
422  viewer2.reset(new pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer ("viewer2", false));
423  w1->SetRenderWindow(viewer1->getRenderWindow());
424  w2->SetRenderWindow(viewer2->getRenderWindow());
425  w1->update();
426  w2->update();
427  viewer1->setCameraPosition( 0.146598, 0.0941454, -4.95334, -0.0857047, -0.0396425, 0.600109, -0.00146821, -0.999707, -0.0241453, 0);
428  viewer2->setCameraPosition( 0.146598, 0.0941454, -4.95334, -0.0857047, -0.0396425, 0.600109, -0.00146821, -0.999707, -0.0241453, 0);
429  QHBoxLayout *layout = new QHBoxLayout;
430  ui.groupBox_12->setLayout(layout);
431  ui.groupBox_12->layout()->addWidget(w1);
432  ui.groupBox_12->layout()->addWidget(w2);
433 
434  // Set up filter/manipulator
435  ui.filter_box->addItems(manipulator->getFilters());
436  QStringList xyz;
437  xyz.append("x");
438  xyz.append("y");
439  xyz.append("z");
440  ui.filter_XYZ->addItems(xyz);
441 
442  QStringList models;
443  models.append("boxHole");
444  models.append("boxHoleSide");
445  models.append("boxHoleUp");
446  models.append("cone");
447  models.append("freakthing");
448  ui.modelList->addItems(models);
449 
450 
451 
452 }
